name: Thai Crispy Garlic Prawns Recipe
description: The BEST Thai garlic prawns, crispy, garlicky, with a creamy sauce.

video.name: Delicious and unique Thai crispy garlic prawns with pepper recipe #thaifood #thairecipe #prawnrecipe #crispygarlic ##กระทะดีบอกต่อ

recipeIngredient: 6 cloves garlic (crush with a mortar and pestle)

itemListElement.text: Heat neutral oil in a wok until hot.
itemListElement.name: Heat neutral oil in a wok until hot.

itemListElement.text: Remove and drain on paper towels.
itemListElement.name: Remove and drain on paper towels.

itemListElement.text: In the same garlic-infused oil, fry the prawns skin-on. Cook until cooked through, about 2 minutes each side, depending on the size of your prawns.
itemListElement.name: In the same garlic-infused oil, fry the prawns skin-on. Cook until cooked through, about 2 minutes each side, depending on the size of your prawns.

itemListElement.text: Scoop them up with a colander and let any extra oil drip off.
itemListElement.name: Scoop them up with a colander and let any extra oil drip off.

itemListElement.text: Remove most of the oil from the pan, leaving just a bit behind. That's what we'll need for making the sauce.
itemListElement.name: Remove most of the oil from the pan, leaving just a bit behind. That's what we'll need for making the sauce.

itemListElement.text: In the remaining oil, add crushed garlic. Sauté until golden, about 20 seconds.
itemListElement.name: In the remaining oil, add crushed garlic. Sauté until golden, about 20 seconds.

itemListElement.text: Add light soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, and natural cooking cream. Cook the sauce, constantly stirring, until mixed well and sugar dissolves. You'll end up with a thick sauce when it's ready. If you prefer a thin sauce, add 2 tablespoons of water.
itemListElement.name: Add light soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, and natural cooking cream. Cook the sauce, constantly stirring, until mixed well and sugar dissolves. You'll end up with a thick sauce when it's ready. If you prefer a thin sauce, add 2 tablespoons of water.

itemListElement.text: Serve garlic prawns with rice. Top them with crispy fried garlic and black pepper, then drizzle with sauce.
itemListElement.name: Serve garlic prawns with rice. Top them with crispy fried garlic and black pepper, then drizzle with sauce.

review.reviewBody:
Hey HT! 

I just checked the package labeling for you, and it says: UHT NON-DAIRY CREAM by Maxime Chef (Master Martini Brand) 

I hope this gives you enough information, sadly the labeling doesn't give any more information than that, enjoy making the recipe!

I have a question regarding the recipe ingredients. What is natural cooking cream? Is that another way of saying heavy cream (cows milk)? I'd love to make this as it looks and sounds amazing but want to make sure I use the right ingredients. Thanks!
